name: VHS Horror
description:
Horror FPS where you explore a mansion (and its mirror dimension, accessed via VHS tapes) to try to fight and escape from the horrors that the mansion throws at you.

This game project was built for my first-year University assignment and acts as a vertical slice of a survival horror game I would love to work on more in the future, while very short I feel this gives off the vibe I would want to expand on with further development.

If you are interested, you can read things like the dev log and documentation on my personal portfolio site and I would love any feedback, be as brutal as you like!
